Role: Leader.

Power Source: Divine.

Key Abilities: Wisdom, Constitution

Armor Proficiencies: Cloth, leather, hide, chainmail; heavy shields, light shields.

Weapon Proficiencies: Simple melee, simple ranged.

Implement: Holy symbols

Bonus to Defense: +1 Fortitude, +1 Will.

Hit Points at 1st Level : 12+ Constitution Score.

Hit Points per Level Gained : 5

Healing Surges per Day : 7+ Constitution Modifier.

Trained Skills : Religion. From the class skills list below, choose 3 more trained skills at 1st level.

Class Skills : Arcana (Int), Diplomacy (Cha), Heal (Wis), History (Int), Insight (Wis), Religion (Int).

Class features: Channel Divinity Powers, Domain Features, Healing Word, Level 1 Warpriest Daily Power.

 

CLERIC (WARPRIEST) CLASS FEATURES

Level 1:

Channel Divinity Powers

You gain the smite undead power plus a channel divinity power associated with your domain. You can use only one channel divinity power per encounter.

Smite Undead; Blessing of the Wild; Faerie-Flame Strike; Fey Sight; Graceful Switch; Blessing of Knowledge; Singing Strike; Sudden Inspiration; Thought Twister; Blessing of Light; Brand of the Moon; Illuminating Blow; Moon Weapon; Blessing of Battle; Brand of the Sun; Sun Burst; Sun's Glow; Blessing of Law; Ringing Blow; Shielding Strike; True Strike;

Healing Word

You gain the healing word power.

Healing Word;

Level 1 Warpriest Daily Power

You gain one of the following powers of your choice.

Lesser Aspect of Wrath; Levy of Judgment; Nimbus of Holy Shielding;

Level 2:

Level 2 Warpriest Utility Power

You gain one of the following powers of your choice.

Bless; Cure Light Wounds; Resurgent Strength; Shield of Faith;

Level 3:

Level 3 Domain Encounter Power

You gain an encounter attack power associated with your domain.

Blessing of Dust; Heal; Purify;

Level 23:

Level 23 Domain Encounter Power

You gain an encounter attack power associated with your domain. This new power replaces the encounter attack power you gained at 7th level from your domain.

Level 23 Corellon Domain Encounter Power; Awful to Behold; Level 23 Death Domain Encounter Power; Death's Touch; Level 23 Domination Domain Encounter Power; Spirits of Victory; Level 23 Earth Domain Encounter Power; Earthen Chains; Level 23 Oghma Domain Encounter Power; Shared Secrets; Level 23 Selûne Domain Encounter Power; Moon Tide; Level 23 Storm Domain Encounter Power; Thunder of Justice; Level 23 Sun Domain Encounter Power; Overwhelming Light; Level 23 Torm Domain Encounter Power; Revitalizing Shove;

Level 25:

Level 25 Warpriest Daily Power

You gain one of the following powers of your choice. This new power replaces the daily attack power you gained at 9th level.

Divine Battle Lord; Subjugating Strike;

Level 27:

Level 27 Domain Encounter Power

You gain an encounter attack power associated with your domain. This new power replaces the encounter attack power you gained at 13th level from your domain.

Level 27 Corellon Domain Encounter Power; Strikes of Woe and Weal; Level 27 Death Domain Encounter Power; Herald of Inevitable Doom; Level 27 Domination Domain Encounter Power; Sundered Bravery; Level 27 Oghma Domain Encounter Power; Thought Destroyer; Level 27 Selûne Domain Encounter Power; Staggering Moonglow; Level 27 Storm Domain Encounter Power; Thunder of the Dawn War; Level 27 Sun Domain Encounter Power; Light of the First Dawn; Level 27 Torm Domain Encounter Power; Valorous Charge;

Level 29:

Level 29 Warpriest Daily Power

You gain one of the following powers of your choice. This new power replaces the daily attack power you gained at 15th level.

Ordained Victory; Visage of the Gods;

Published in Heroes of the Fallen Lands, page(s) 80.
